Data: Mohammad Asif to Katich, no run almost had it here, Asif finds some life off the pitch, moving it back into Katich and striking the pad via the inside edge
Mohammad Asif to Katich, 3 runs neatly done from Katich, didn't try to over-hit the ball, just pushed his hands through the line outside off and collected a three through cover
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run Pakistan might need to do this for a while, just try and stem the flow of runs, outside off stump, moving away a fraction and Clarke leaves alone
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run high quality leave this, it pitched on off stump, and moved away and Clarke left alone

Mohammad Asif to Clarke, 2 runs Asif is suckered into cricket's age-old rule, where there is movement outside off, but never from leg stump, all of which means Clarke nudges a couple through square leg
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run outside off stump this time, moving away a fraction and left alone
Afridi to Katich, 1 run Afridi continues, and this is slightly better than how he started the last over, on leg stump and tickled round the corner
Afridi to Clarke, no run Clarke forward and defending, better from Afridi
Afridi to Clarke, no run Clarke skips up the wicket and defends
Afridi to Clarke, 1 run Afridi can't quite maintain a decent length it seems, this is short and Clarke is back in a flash and cutting to deep point
Afridi to Katich, FOUR runs eep, very ugly stuff from Afridi, very very short and wide outside off stump, Katich clumps it through cover for four
Afridi to Katich, 2 runs shoved full and down the leg side, Katich gloves a sweep shot down to fine leg for two more. Captain under pressure
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run Asif again finds the line just outside off stump, Clarke happily leaves alone
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run what a good delivery this is! Absolutely cuts Clarke in half. The batsman came forward to defend it jagged back straight through him and over the top of the stumps
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run big movement here from Asif, snaking away late, but Clarke is seeing it well and leaving alone
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run Clarke this time opts to defend, and does so very certainly, Asif is bowling a fraction short, which is unlike him
Mohammad Asif to Clarke, no run that's a better length, but it's too far outside off stump to draw a shot from Clarke

Mohammad Asif to Clarke, OUT Asif strikes! The last ball before tea, and Pakistan really needed this! It was a touch fuller, pitched in line and jagged back down the slope, Clarke was beaten by the movement as he tried to defend and this time umpire Gould gives the decision. Touch unlucky
Umar Gul to Katich, no run full outside off stump, leans into a well-timed drive but mid-off makes a good save
Umar Gul to Katich, no run outside off, keeps a fraction low and Katich stabs it into the covers
Umar Gul to Katich, 2 runs gets a leading edge on a drive which nearly goes back to Gul, but beats the out-stretched hand and beats mid-off down the ground
Umar Gul to Katich, 1 run round the wicket, worked from off stump into midwicket
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run outside off and left alone
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run pushed down the leg side and the angle from round the wicket takes it further
Mohammad Asif to Katich, no run outside off and left alone
Mohammad Asif to Katich, no run well bowled, nips back off the seam from a good length and takes Katich high on the pads

Mohammad Asif to Katich, OUT gone! Asif gets another and it's a massive wicket. On off stump and late movement away from Katich which took the outside edge through to Kamran Akmal. A cracking ball. The previous one came back in, this one shaped away.
Mohammad Asif to North, no run ooh, late movement from a full length and that almost took pad first which would have been plumb lbw. Well, replays show it was pad first but the appeal was very muted
Mohammad Asif to North, no run more movement, this time takes the inside edge into the leg side...nearly beat the stroke again

Mohammad Asif to North, OUT gone! What a beauty from Asif and North goes without scoring. Swung back into the left hander who played a loose drive and the ball took off stump. Great sight for Pakistan
Amir to Hussey, no run wide outside off, very full and left alone
Amir to Hussey, no run outside off and this one carries nicely through to Akmal
Amir to Hussey, 1 run on off stump and leans forward to push it into the gap at cover
Amir to Paine, no run full outside off, searching for that swing back but it goes straight on and is well left alone
Amir to Paine, no run ooh, well bowled, that moved back late and Paine defended into the leg side...dangerous to play across the front pad to Aamer
Amir to Paine, 1 wide that comes out all wrong, sprayed well wide of off stump and he'll have to bowl that one again

Amir to Paine, 1 run blimey, he was late on that, he swung sharp and late and Paine jabbed down on it...Hussey calls him through for a quick run - his first in Test cricket - as short leg tries to flick the ball back onto the stumps
Mohammad Asif to Paine, FOUR runs more swing and this time it takes the outside edge, but he played with soft hands so it runs safely between third slip and gully down to third man
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run good line on off stump, defended into the covers
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run outside off and left alone
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run full on middle, Paine defends straight back to the bowler but was almost squared up
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run touch shorter and outside off, a comfortable leave for the right hander
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run fuller and closer to off stump but Paine leaves it alone again
Amir to Hussey, no run fuller and wide of off stump, Aamer just hasn't quite got his line right
Amir to Hussey, no run closer to the batsman this time but Hussey and leave it alone again
Amir to Hussey, no run on the stumps, makes him play this time, and pushed back to Aamer
Amir to Hussey, no run outside off and left alone
Amir to Hussey, no run down the leg side, very wayward and he seems to striving a touch too hard at the moment
Amir to Hussey, no run another wild delivery down the leg side and Akmal does well to dive across...probably Aamer's worst over of the day
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run lovely shape, outside off and curves away from Paine who watches it well and leaves alone
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run on off stump, doesn't swing this time and Paine defends into the leg side
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run ouch! Extra bounce on this one as it climbs off a good length and takes Paine on the gloves...that may have caused some pain (I'll get my coat)
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run full outside off, trying to tempt the drive and Paine does well to resist as he leaves alone
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run swings away outside off and left alone
Mohammad Asif to Paine, no run comes half forward and defends a full delivery to the leg side
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, 1 run outside off and nicely driven through the covers but there's a sweeper out on the boundary
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run that's a ripper, turns from middle stump and beats the outside edge as Paine comes forward
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run tossed up outside leg, Paine defends to the on side
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run full on middle, flicked down to mid-on
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run on off stump, leans forward and defends past silly point towards mid-off
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run driven back to the bowler
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run full on off stump, a hint of that swing back into the left hander but Hussey is able to defend with bat and pad together
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run nice ball outside off, seams away as Hussey leaves alone
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run loses his line this time, too wide of off stump and Hussey not bothered by it
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, 1 run much better, full on off stump, Hussey pushes towards mid-off who is caught on his heels and it's a quick single
Mohammad Asif to Paine, 1 run flicked off middle stump out to deep square
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, FOUR runs touch too straight, Hussey picks him off through midwicket for a welcome boundary...Asif angry with himself, but we'll allow him that loose ball after this spell
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run on leg stump, flicked down to mid-on
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run turned in the air this time, but no one is catching at midwicket
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run same spot and now there's a man at midwicket who collects it
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run very full on off stump, dug out back to the bowler
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run tossed up on off stump, sharp turn as Paine leaves it alone
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run on middle and defended to end a very tidy maiden
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run back of a length on off stump, defended square on the off side
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run full and wide of off stump, Hussey comes forward then leaves it alone
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, FOUR runs dragged down a touch short, Hussey quickly onto it and fetches the ball from outside off through midwicket
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run good carry outside off, Hussey shoulders arms and Akmal takes above his head
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run full outside off, shapes back into Hussey who defends into the off side
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run good one to finish with on middle and off which Hussey prods into the leg side
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run on middle and off, defended back down the pitch
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run played off the back foot down in front of short leg
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run onto the front foot and defended
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run waits for the turn and flicks it on the bounce to short leg
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run into the covers
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run Nearly! Paine almost chips a return catch off a very full delivery, he scooped it towards Kaneria but it landed about a foot short of him
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run outside off and left alone
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run full outside off, shoulders arms again
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run too wide again from Gul, he hasn't made Hussey play yet in this over
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run pushed across the left hander and it's another leave
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run on the stumps this time and worked out to midwicket...was a slightly fuller length, too, which is better
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run dragged down short outside but Hussey doesn't time his cut and it is toe-ended into the covers
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run nicely bowled on off stump, hint of turn as Paine defends square on the off side
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run touch short and cut away to backward point
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run straighter ball, Paine plays into the leg side off the back foot
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run comes onto the front foot and defends into the covers
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run outside off and some sharp spin as it's left alone
Danish Kaneria to Paine, no run turned in the air down towards mid-on...danger of a leading edge
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run outside off and it carries nicely through to Akmal at waist height
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run much fuller and Hussey drives down towards mid-on...there's a direct hit but Paine has made his ground very easily
Umar Gul to Paine, no run big appeal for lbw as Gul fires in a full delivery but it's going down the leg side
Umar Gul to Paine, no run back of a length outside off, defended into the covers
Umar Gul to Paine, no run misses out on a boundary here as he clips a leg-stump half volley, but it goes straight to midwicket...Paine can't break free
Umar Gul to Paine, no run good ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run edged, but doesn't carry to slip. Outside off and Hussey pushed forward but not quite hard enough for it to reach the fielder
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, 1 run waits on the back foot and works out to deep square
Danish Kaneria to Paine, 1 run tossed up on off stump, driven to mid-off and that's a lazy single for Pakistan to give away
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, SIX runs slog sweep, fetched from outside off and launches it over deep midwicket...that was more akin to his Twenty20 innings in St Lucia
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, FOUR runs back to back boundaries, wide outside off and Hussey slots a perfect drive between cover and mid-off
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run plays back and defended into the covers
Umar Gul to Paine, (no ball) Gul gets things going after the break with an enormous no ball, not very smart that

Umar Gul to Paine, OUT gets this right though! Gul finally joins the paceman's party and Paine's tough debut innings is over! It was a touch quicker and it bounced a fraction more on Paine, moving away and clipping the outside edge through to Akmal, who made no mistake
Umar Gul to Smith, (no ball) gets another no ball from Gul first up, apart from that it was a good delivery, yorker that Smith just jabbed a bat down in time on
Umar Gul to Smith, no run this is better, in the sense that it was a legal delivery, but worse in terms of line, giving Smith an early chance to leave alone outside off
Umar Gul to Smith, no run this was a touch wide again, but not as wide as Gul's smile after he saw this bend away late, big reverse swing, which might keep things interesting
Umar Gul to Smith, no run gets the line right, perhaps it's a touch too short though and Smith gets behind a solid defence
Umar Gul to Smith, no run well judged by Smith, who looks confident enough leaving alone
Umar Gul to Smith, 1 run Smith is away, working this to midwicket and scampering through for a single

Danish Kaneria to Smith, OUT And Kaneria wins the battle straight away! Pitched in line, it was a topspinner that squeezed between bat and pad, stuck in front, but replays show Smith got a faint inside edge, so he's unlucky. Big wicket that!
Danish Kaneria to Johnson, no run Johnson gets a googly first up, didn't read it by the looks of things but left alone
Danish Kaneria to Johnson, 3 runs very nicely flighted by Kaneria, looking to tease a big shot out of Johnson, but the batsman instead leant it through midwicket very comfortably, collecting three
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run thrown up outside off stump to Hussey, who stretches forward to block towards point

Danish Kaneria to Hussey, 1 run Hussey is very confident driving to the covers, but Afridi is adopting the horrible tactic of gifting him singles with a deep-set field. Bad at the best of times and unforgivable off the fifth delivery
Danish Kaneria to Johnson, no run fired down the leg side to finish the over, Akmal collects smartly and rewards himself by whipping off the bails

Umar Gul to Hussey, no run good from Gul, full and attacking the stumps, Hussey forward and defending uneasily. Pakistan have to get him out, not gift him singles. It will be a low scoring game and Hussey can make a big difference
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run the wicket might just have given Gul some confidence, he's really bounding in, finds some extra bounce and hurries Hussey into a defence
Umar Gul to Hussey, (no ball) another no ball ruins what would have been a good bouncer, forcing Hussey to sway away swiftly
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run Gul getting the ball to move around still, jagging this back into Hussey's pads
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run outside off stump here and Hussey happily leaves alone
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run fuller from Gul, straighter too, Hussey pushes confidently towards extra cover
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run a very straight ball meets an even straighter bat to finish the over, Hussey full-facing down the wicket
Danish Kaneria to Johnson, no run nicely bowled, flight, loop, late dip, Johnson played all round it
Danish Kaneria to Johnson, no run nicely bowled again, Johnson is picking up his bat with the look of a man intent on swiping it over midwicket, but instead leaves alone
Danish Kaneria to Johnson, no run left alone again outside off, this is a googly though
Danish Kaneria to Johnson, no run Johnson completes a hat-trick of leaves outside off
Danish Kaneria to Johnson, no run top bowling this, straighter, another googly and drew Johnson into a defence, had no idea which way it was spinning and went past the outside edge

Danish Kaneria to Johnson, OUT lovely bowling! Really good to watch! The pressure built all over, Johnson had no idea what was going on, this was looped up outside off, Johnson aimed an airy drive and it spun back quickly through the gate on to the stumps

Amir to Hussey, FOUR runs while Hussey is still standing Australia will always be fighting, this was a bit of a grim half-tracker from Aamer and Hussey made no mistake, taking full advantage to crash it firmly through straight midwicket
Amir to Hussey, no run back on to a line and length now, Hussey defends
Amir to Hussey, no run it's still a touch short from Aamer, but the line is good and Hussey can only defend
Amir to Hussey, 2 runs this is fuller but angling towards the legs, Hussey picked out Kaneria at fine leg and swiftly completed a couple. Hussey loves these situations
Amir to Hussey, no run better line this time and Hussey defends firmly
Amir to Hussey, no run that will do for Pakistan, much fuller from Asif, and touch of swing too, but outside off stump and Hussey leaves it alone
Danish Kaneria to Hilfenhaus, no run ooh good ball first up, loop and bounce and quick turn past the outside edge
Danish Kaneria to Hilfenhaus, no run nicely bowled again, plenty of air, Hilfenhaus drives firmly to mid off
Danish Kaneria to Hilfenhaus, no run quite big spin here for day 1, Hilfenhaus leaves alone and watches it spin
Danish Kaneria to Hilfenhaus, no run wrong-un here and Hilfenhaus squeezed a defence via bat and pad
Danish Kaneria to Hilfenhaus, no run nicely played here, Hilfenhaus getting off side of the ball to defend. Kaneria has found a good rhythm here though
Danish Kaneria to Hilfenhaus, no run Kaneria probably just a bit excited, rushing his over a fraction, and this is a full toss that is patted down to mid on
Amir to Hussey, no run Aamer has got this all wrong, shoved short and well outside off stump, Hussey leaves alone
Amir to Hussey, 1 run well, Hussey takes a single, he has no problems giving Hilfenhaus the strike
Amir to Hilfenhaus, 1 run this is ideal for Australia, Hilfenhaus pushes it through gully for a single, very poor misfield
Amir to Hussey, no run touch shorter and moving away from Hussey, he defends confidently to point
Amir to Hussey, 1 run square leg is set on the boundary, which is very poor, so Hussey happily knocks it into the leg side and collects a single
Amir to Hilfenhaus, OUT the plan works! Aamer only needs one ball! It was full, swung back and through Hilfenhaus's defence to rattle off stump!
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run but Hussey has strike and defends carefully to the covers, very deep set field
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run good ball this, bit of bounce and spin, Hussey under no pressure, apart from slip there is not a fielder in sight, and defends
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run good ball this, pushed across Hussey finds an edge that runs past slip for a couple
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, 1 run oops, Hussey pushes into the leg side and sets off for two, but crashes into the generous figure of Bollinger as he runs the first one, so can only take a single
Danish Kaneria to Bollinger, no run Bollinger looks completely certain here, forward and defending like a Test opener
Danish Kaneria to Bollinger, no run no problems for Bollinger again, digging out a fuller ball - Hussey will have 250 as his first target
Amir to Hussey, no run Hussey happy to watch this go by outside off stump
Amir to Hussey, no run Hussey pushes to deep cover and doesn't take the single
Amir to Hussey, FOUR runs he's a dangerous man Hussey, dragged a fraction short from Aamer and he takes full toll, playing a controlled pull shot perfectly for four down to deep square
Amir to Hussey, 1 run this time he gets this single, pushing to deep midwicket, so Aamer will have two deliveries to finish this off
Amir to Bollinger, no run Bollinger does this well, it's full and he digs it out solidly
Amir to Bollinger, no run job done for Bollinger! At least for this over. Full toss, he pokes it to midwicket and Hussey will have six against Kaneria
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run field set deep again, Hussey pushes it into the gaping space in front of square on the leg side, but doesn't take a single
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run once again Hussey pushes towards deep midwicket, doesn't take a single
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run this time it's quicker and outside off and Hussey leaves alone
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run touch fuller, Hussey pushes it towards deep cover, again no run taken
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run strangely, there are still fielders set deep, giving Hussey one at this stage, but the delivery is good and Hussey can only come forward and defend back to the bowler
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run slightly quicker from Kaneria, Hussey gets everything behind a block and Bollinger will have to face the next over
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run shoved outside off stump, Bollinger leaves alone imperiously
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run this is slightly closer too off stump, Bollinger pops forward and leaves alone again
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run lovely delivery this, jagging back into Bollinger, the batsman managed to squeeze a bat down in time
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run seaming back into the pads again, Bollinger struggling a touch but gets an inside edge on to his pads and it squirts into the off side
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run thrown up well outside off, Hussey has a heart attack as he sees Bollinger have a big heave-ho at it, swishing at thin air
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run just a fraction too wide to finish the over, Bollinger gets to leave so, light permitting, Hussey gets another over tonight
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run thrown up to Hussey, who bunts it firmly down to long on and refuses a single
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run Hussey stretches forward outside off stump into a studious defensive block
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run wrong-un dragged a touch short, and Hussey tried to smash this out of London, a touch too quick on the shot so can't time it
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run thrown up outside off stump, Hussey blocks
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, no run outside off again, full and Hussey leaves alone
Danish Kaneria to Hussey, 1 run very sloppy from Pakistan, mid off dozing, so Hussey pushes and runs to mid off and keeps the strike
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run outside off, a gentle loosener to start with, and left alone
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run full outside off, a hint of swing back into the left hander and it's left alone
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, 1 run first run of the day, outside off stump and pushed into the leg side
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run too wide, the No. 11 doesn't have to play as this one goes across him
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run good line on off stump, Bollinger is quite late bringing the bat down but manages to defend into the covers
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run on leg stump, takes the thigh pad as he tries to work it into the leg side so Bollinger does his job and survives the over
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run dragged down short, Hussey connects cleanly with a crunching pull but it goes straight to man half the way back at midwicket
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run wide of the stumps and Hussey watches it go through to the keeper
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run back of a length on middle and off, Hussey plays a textbook defensive shot back to the bowler
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run on leg stump and flicked down through fine leg, the fielder is quite square but Hussey is happy to take just a single
Umar Gul to Bollinger, no run first bouncer of the day and Bollinger is able to duck underneath without too much trouble
Umar Gul to Bollinger, no run poor ball to end the over, down the leg side and the batsman doesn't make contact...have to make the No. 11 play
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, FOUR runs valuable boundary, but a little streaky, Hussey goes to leave this outside off and gets a toe-end which flies between second slip and gully to the vacant third man
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, no run on leg stump, pushed to the on side and the bowler scoots across in his follow through
Mohammad Asif to Hussey, 1 run tucked off the pads into midwicket
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run full on off stump, met with a handsome drive by Bollinger which goes straight to mid off...he enjoyed the feel of that
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, no run short ball over off stump and it doesn't cause any problems
Mohammad Asif to Bollinger, FOUR runs offered some width, Bollinger flashes hard outside off and the ball flies over gully down to third man...he went hard and it was well away from the fielder
Umar Gul to Hussey, FOUR runs ooh, nearly chops this into the stumps but the inside edge races past the stumps down to fine leg...takes Hussey to a valuable fifty
Umar Gul to Hussey, (no ball) he oversteps this time as Hussey defends to backward point...Pakistan can't afford to lose their way this morning
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run worked off leg stump wide of mid-on but Hussey declines the single

Umar Gul to Hussey, no run well bowled, nipped back from outside off and takes the pad. A big appeal from Gul but don't think had done enough to take off stump...was struck outside off and a touch too high as well
Umar Gul to Hussey, no run defended square on the off side
Umar Gul to Hussey, 1 run chopped down towards backward point
Umar Gul to Bollinger, no run well played, defended off the back foot into the covers
Amir to Hussey, no run cut away and well fielded in the gully
Amir to Hussey, no run inside edge into the body which bobbles into the off side
Amir to Hussey, no run back of a length outside off, Hussey defends it down by his feet and it rolls back towards the slips
Amir to Hussey, FOUR runs outside off, pushes away from the body and the outside edge beats gully for another boundary to third man...wasn't the best effort by Azhar Ali
Amir to Hussey, no run outside off and left alone
Amir to Hussey, 1 wide very wide and called so by umpire Gould...Aamer was trying to keep Hussey off strike but he forced that delivery
Amir to Hussey, no run good finish, Hussey can only defend to cover
Umar Gul to Bollinger, (no ball) short and sharp, and that strikes Bollinger on the shoulder. Lively bowling, but he's overstepped
Umar Gul to Bollinger, no run another short ball, and he's struck on the shoulder again. Brutish
Umar Gul to Bollinger, no run third time in the over he takes a blow, on the thigh pad this time as he doesn't offer a shot
Umar Gul to Bollinger, no run well bowled, went for the leg-stump yorker but it swung too much and would have missed leg
Umar Gul to Bollinger, no run solid from the No.11, defended into the off side
Umar Gul to Bollinger, no run punched off the back foot square on the off side...Dougie growing in confidence, which could be dangerous
Umar Gul to Bollinger, no run full on middle and well dug out down to mid-on...he's doing very well so far
Amir to Hussey, no run outside off, ushered through with no stroke offered
Amir to Hussey, no run well wide of off stump, nearly called as such
Amir to Hussey, 1 run dabbed down to third man. Three balls for Bollinger to negotiate
Amir to Bollinger, no run outside off, left alone with a raise of the bat. Well played
Amir to Bollinger, OUT not so well played! The perfect ball to a No. 11. A full inswinging yorker, clatters the pads, ricochets into the stumps, and Australia's first innings is over!

A real test for a young Pakistan batting line-up, which features two debutants in Umar Amin and Azhar Ali - about whom Andy Zaltzman has written in his latest Confectionary Stall blog. Read it at once, I implore you.

So, a valuable late contribution from Bollinger, who helped Hussey add 31 for the last wicket. Will 253 be a par score? It might well be, if Australia use the conditions with anything like the same skill. Don't go away, unless it's to boil the kettle. We're all for that sort of behaviour.

So, the teams are back out, and after his efforts with the bat, it will be Doug Bollinger to take the new ball. He has Imran Farhat in his sights, with three slips and a gully. Cover point, and a short leg
Bollinger to Farhat, no run outside off, a hint of movement but way wide of the stumps
Bollinger to Farhat, no run tighter to the stumps but still no stroke offered, as Farhat draws his bat inside the line
Bollinger to Farhat, no run a squeak of anguish as this one curls round the edge. He's getting tighter to the bat
Bollinger to Farhat, no run still no stroke offered, as Bollinger finds his range
Bollinger to Farhat, no run a hint of outswing, still no stroke offered
Bollinger to Farhat, no run wider of the crease and speared into the pads. Farhat puts bat to ball to complete the maiden
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run good bend from Hilfenhaus, who can always be relied upon to find some swing
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run banged in shorter, and watched through to the keeper
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run good bowling, full and swinging back into the left-hander. Squeezed back down the track with bat and pad together
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run more subtle inswing, defensively played again
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run this one goes the other way, and there's no stroke offered
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, 2 runs the first runs of the innings, pushed into the covers
Bollinger to Farhat, no run pushed onto the back foot, defended down into the crease
Bollinger to Farhat, FOUR runs that's a freebie, a loose half-volley on leg stump, and Farhat nudges that off down the hill. He's away
Bollinger to Farhat, no run short again, no stroke offered
Bollinger to Farhat, no run too wide to tempt a stroke, but more signs of swing
Bollinger to Farhat, no run much fuller and perhaps a touch slower. Defended firmly from the crease
Bollinger to Farhat, no run outside off stump, left alone again
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run that's a good length from Hilfenhaus, as the ball tails back into off stump, and is stabbed back up the crease without much foot movement
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run defended again, outside off stump
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, FOUR runs on the pads, and flicked in the air, through midwicket. There was a fielder hovering, but he placed it well enough
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run watchful defence, with a big stride forward, as Hilfenhaus attacks off stump again
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run on the pads again, but can't work it away
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, (no ball) forward and defended, that's the business length for Hilfenhaus. Bending into off stump
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run fractionally back of a length, dabbed out to point. Solid start from Pakistan's openers
Johnson to Farhat, no run that's a good start, attacking the top of off stump at a lively pace
Johnson to Farhat, no run slightly wider of off stump, but nowhere near as wide as he was in 2009
Johnson to Farhat, no run outside off, no stroke again, as Johnson builds his rhythm
Johnson to Farhat, no run that's a good delivery, up to the bootlaces, with a hint of inswing. Defended
Johnson to Farhat, no run through to the keeper again, decent bowling
Johnson to Farhat, no run in the corridor outside off, the end of a tidy exploratory over
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run outside off, through to the keeper. Australia have been tidy, but Hilfenhaus aside, they've not attacked the stumps
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run too much width again, and left alone again
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run too few reasons to go after the ball here. Another one sails through to the keeper
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run much tighter, but still not tight enough. Good judgment and another leave-alone
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run outside off again, lifting delivery
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run another unthreatening over comes to an end
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run width outside off, and Azhar negotiates his first delivery without fuss
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, 1 run he's off the mark with a cool push into the covers. A hint of outswing
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run fizzed out wide, across the left-hander. Nothing doing there
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run dabbed into the covers from deep in the crease
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, FOUR runs a pokey drive, up the hill and into the hoardings. Not the most confident cover-drive of all time. But effective enough, good late wristwork to apply some oomph
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, no run that's a ripper, nipping off the seam and past the edge
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, no run urgently forward and pushed to cover. Good attacking length now, bringing the stumps and slips into play
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, no run bouncer, and comfortably ducked
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, 2 runs drawn into a loose one-handed drive, back past the bowler. Safe enough in the end
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, no run drilled onto the back foot by Bollinger's aggressive length. Defended from the crease
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, 3 runs sweetly clipped down the hill, not quite timed but he's up and running
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run outside off, sharp nip off the seam
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run full again, seaming late, no stroke offered
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run swinging down the slope, and again, left alone
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run flicked to midwicket without any timing
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run blocked on the line of off stump, fielded at point
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run outside off, no stroke. A tidy maiden comes to an end
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run fired down the leg side and Butt misses his attempted flick
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run adjusts his line but is a little too wide of off stump this time and left alone
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run that's more like it, on off stump and Butt defends solidly into the off side
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run good bouncer, over off stump and Butt sways out of the line
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run touch too wide but Butt doesn't time his shot into the offside
Bollinger to Salman Butt, FOUR runs top shot, touch too full from Bollinger and Butt leans into a nice cover drive which races to the boundary
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, FOUR runs outside off, opens the face and runs it through backward point...slows up over the outfield but has enough legs to cross the rope
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run back of a length on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run outside edge! Good ball with a hint of swing, Azhar plays forward but the edge doesn't carry to second slip
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run on off stump, defended into the off side
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run uncertain from Azhar as he goes to leave this and the ball gets the bottom of the bat but falls well short of the slips
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, 2 leg byes drifts onto leg stump, takes the pad down to long leg
Bollinger to Salman Butt, 3 runs goes full on the stumps, punched through the leg side with a straight bat and Katich gives chase from mid-on
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, no run well bowled, extra bounce from short of a length and Azhar fends uncertainly at it...lucky not to get an edge and he didn't need to play
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, no run wasted ball this time, dragged down really short and wide and he's lucky not to be called...that was like some of Johnson's deliveries here last year
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, no run much better, back of a length on middle and off, Azhar is slightly opened up as he defends into the covers
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, FOUR runs banged in short on leg stump, neatly played by Azhar as he flicks it very fine past the keeper and long leg can't get around
Bollinger to Azhar Ali, no run fuller and outside off stump, played with a well-judged leave
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, 1 run full on off stump, Butt plays forward and places it into the off side for an easy single
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run bouncer from Hilfenhaus and easily avoided
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run short outside off stump, swings away but started too wide to make him play
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run that's a good length, outside off stump and Azhar doesn't really move his feet as he pushes into a defensive shot that runs to gully
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run full, wide and swinging away further as the batsman watches it go through
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run too wide again and Azhar isn't interested in that...not the best over you'll see
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run starts well on off stump, Butt jabs down and into the off side
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run full on off stump, maybe a hint of movement into the left hander, and it's punched out to midwicket
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run drags the length back a touch, defended from off stump into the covers
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run ah, well bowled and a loose shot, was full and swing away which drew Butt into a flat-footed drive
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run full on middle, punched straight back down the pitch and Johnson sticks out his left hand to field
Johnson to Salman Butt, FOUR runs slashed away, driven on the up square through the off side with plenty of flourish from Butt...a brave shot in swinging conditions and there wasn't much footwork
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run not much footwork from Azhar, either, as he defends this from the crease square on the off side
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, 1 run back of a length, punched off the back foot through mid-off which is currently a vacant area
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run pushed across well outside off and left alone
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run full on off stump, comes half forward and defends into the off side
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run nicely bowled, late movement from Hilfenhaus as he draws Butt forward and an inside edge goes into the leg side
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run pushed outside off stump and an easy leave to end the over
Johnson to Azhar Ali, no run full outside off, Azhar drives down to mid-off
Johnson to Azhar Ali, no run touch more bounce from Johnson, Azhar takes his bottom hand off the bat as he pushes into the leg side
Johnson to Azhar Ali, no run angled across and left alone
Johnson to Azhar Ali, no run good bouncer, rapid delivery which climbs over middle and off which means Azhar has to jump out of the line
Johnson to Azhar Ali, 1 run goes full this time, driven towards mid-off who can only half stop the ball
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run on off stump, skids onto Butt and he jabs it into the pitch...testing over from Johnson who is working up good pace
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run drifting towards leg stump, but takes the pad as Azhar doesn't connect
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run defended into the leg side
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run half an appeal from Hilfenhaus, but this has taken a large chunk of bat into the pad...not much going for that shout
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run dragged a little wide of off stump and left alone
Hilfenhaus to Azhar Ali, no run fuller this time and nice carry through to Paine as Azhar leaves alone
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run nicely timed as he flicks into the leg side but straight to midwicket
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run outside off, hint of shape away and left alone

Johnson to Salman Butt, FOUR runs short, wide and cut away hard through backward point...poor ball from Johnson and Butt quickly latched on. Was in the air for a while, but clear of the well-packed catching cordon
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run better line closer to off stump and left alone
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run back of a length on off stump, Butt rides the bounce and plays out to cover
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run full outside off, swinging away and left alone
Hilfenhaus to Umar Amin, 1 run he's off the mark straightaway. On the pads, a poor delivery, and gleefully helped round the corner
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run stabbed out to point
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run no stroke as Butt shoulders arms.
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run tentatively forward and defended on off stump
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run outside off again. Gould is obsessing about the light now. It's as if the umpires need another sit-down. Get on with it!
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, FOUR runs drilled into the covers, no problems seeing that!
Johnson to Umar Amin, no run outside off, back of a length, through to the keeper
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run on the pads, watchfully defended to launch his innings. He doesn't defend many, so that's a noteworthy start
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run through to the keeper with a bit of extra pace
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run solidly forward and driven out to cover
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run speared down the leg-side, that's the end of a successful over
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run good delivery, swinging back onto the stumps. Tight line
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run not such a good line as the swing takes this past the leg stump. Paine gathers well with a stretch to his right
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run excellent bowling, an inswinging yorker, but Butt was equal to it. Needed Aamer's pace to penetrate those defences
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, 2 runs nurdled off the pads, and out to midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run blocked firmly on off stump
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, FOUR runs cut and cut hard. That was a touch short and sat up to be hit. And so it was. Top shot
Johnson to Umar Akmal, 2 runs banged in short, and fenced out to square leg. Johnson fielded well at first, but a loose return gifts an overthrow
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run short and aggressive, and Umar wears it on the chest as he drops his gloves out of the way. Played well in the end
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run pushed out to point off the back foot
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run full length and firmly drilled back down the track, Johnson dives in his followthrough to cut off the single. Good commitment
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run defended once again. No freebies on offer in this spell
Johnson to Umar Akmal, no run edged, but just short of second slip! Another excellent delivery, angling across the right-hander, but Umar's soft hands save him there. He's battling well

Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, FOUR runs a touch of width, and Butt chases with hard hands, and gets away with it. A poor stroke, no foot movement and a slashing edge flies through third man. He admonishes himself for that lapse in concentration
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run much tighter line, and much better judgment. No stroke
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run outswinger, well disguised, and pushed to cover
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run driven hard, and half-fielded by the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, 2 runs short and whipped firmly to square leg. Good batting
Hilfenhaus to Salman Butt, no run outside off, a probing over
Johnson to Umar Akmal, 1 run flicked up to mid-on
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run half-forward, jabbed out to cover
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run prodded out to backward point, it's a war of attrition for the batsmen at the moment. And utterly absorbing viewing
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run attacking the top of off stump with a touch of movement. Defended to cover with a vertical bat
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run banged in short, and that fizzes through to the keeper
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run back on that aggressive full length, pushed to cover
Hilfenhaus to Umar Akmal, no run on middle and Umar defends to the leg side
Hilfenhaus to Umar Akmal, no run full outside off, swings away and nicely left alone
Hilfenhaus to Umar Akmal, 2 runs tucked off his legs into the square-leg area...nice use of the wrists to find the gap
Hilfenhaus to Umar Akmal, no run outside off and moves away from the right hander
Hilfenhaus to Umar Akmal, no run no shot needed again as Hilfenhaus probes outside off trying to tempt a drive from Umar
Hilfenhaus to Umar Akmal, no run bat on ball this time as he defends into the covers
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run good bouncer, follows Butt with the angle from over the wicket as he sways out of the line and Paine takes it on the rise
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run loses his line down the leg side and Paine makes a good diving save, managing to get hands to the ball
Johnson to Salman Butt, FOUR runs edged! But through the gap wide of second slip and down to third man...Ponting has taken a slip out for Butt, although that may have evaded even a third
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run on off stump, Butt defends as though that kept a fraction low but think it was just a touch fuller than he thought
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run a very short bouncer this time and Butt has fewer issues getting out of the way
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run full on the stumps, searching for swing, and Butt drives confidently towards mid-off
Watson to Umar Akmal, no run starts full on the stumps, Umar uses his feet and works it to the leg side...positive from the batsman
Watson to Umar Akmal, no run stays in the crease this time and defends into the covers
Watson to Umar Akmal, no run full on off stump, gentle pace so far, and driven up to mid-on
Watson to Kamran, no run beaten! Good ball first up and Kamran pushes tentatively forward as the ball scoots past the edge
Watson to Kamran, no run touch wider and left alone
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run on off stump, defended square on the off side
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run back of a length, touch of extra bounce and Butt defends into the covers

Johnson to Salman Butt, FOUR runs top shot...full delivery on off stump and Butt slots it between mid-off and cover with a perfect drive. That takes him to an impressive fifty off 78 balls. He needs to at least double that, though
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run outside off and left alone
Johnson to Salman Butt, FOUR runs on leg stump and flicked very neatly through midwicket with enough power to evade deep square-leg who run around the boundary
Johnson to Salman Butt, no run left alone

Watson to Kamran, OUT gone! Now Watson has two, what a turn up this is. And Kamran didn't even play a shot! He completely misjudged the line and went to pad up, but the ball was heading straight for middle and off. By the time he realised it was too late and Rudi Koertzen's slow finger wa
Watson to Afridi, no run what a cracker first up, holds its line and beats Afridi's outside edge as he pushes at the ball
Watson to Afridi, FOUR runs first loose ball from Watson, drifting onto leg stump and it's flicked effortlessly through the leg side...in the air, but no fielders there
Watson to Afridi, no run back on off stump and defended firmly into the covers
Watson to Afridi, FOUR runs no holding back, slashes hard at this outside off stump, it was full and swinging away but that won't bother Afridi who throws everything at it and clears backward point
Watson to Afridi, SIX runs here we go, strap in folks, Boom Boom is away as he flicks Watson off middle stump right into the lower tier of the Grandstand
Bollinger to Salman Butt, 1 run on off stump, angled away through backward point to the sweeper and a huge cheer as it brings Afridi back on strike
Bollinger to Afridi, no run bouncer over off stump and Afridi holds himself back by ducking underneath...how boring of him (only kidding, of course)

Bollinger to Afridi, no run oh boy, now he's tried to pick this up from a good length and launch it over midwicket with a front-foot pull...doesn't make contact, but could easily have edged that or dragged it on (or hit it for six, I guess!)
Bollinger to Afridi, no run good leave, and it really was, as this one nips back from off stump
Bollinger to Afridi, 1 run worked off this hip towards where short leg was
Bollinger to Salman Butt, 2 runs offered some width and guides this neatly wide of gully, nice timing but the point sweeper is able to cut off the boundary
Watson to Afridi, FOUR runs another boundary, full and wide of off stump and launches himself into a lofted cover drive which goes two bounces over the rope
Watson to Afridi, no run back of a length, pushes hard with an opening face towards point

Watson to Afridi, FOUR runs ooh, a bit of touch and elegance this time as he opens the face and picks the gap between second slip and gully...he waited for the ball outside off and steered it superbly
Watson to Afridi, 2 runs tucked neatly off middle stump through the leg side and Afridi is also very quick between the wickets which makes this into a couple

Watson to Afridi, SIX runs that's massive! Full on off stump and Afridi drives this monstrously over mid-off. Don't think it even came quite out of the middle, but cleared the rope with ease. What a counterattack.

Watson to Afridi, OUT and Watson's figures have just got even crazier! He's picked up Afridi, and I guess it was bound to happen but what a shame. It was on off stump again and he tried to repeat his drive for six, but didn't connect cleanly and slotted it straight up in the air where Joh
Bollinger to Amir, no run back of a length on off stump, Aamer plays inside the line
Bollinger to Umar Gul, 1 run banged in on leg stump, worked down to long leg
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run back to some normality as Butt defends a ball on off stump
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run tucked into the square-leg area
Bollinger to Salman Butt, no run finishes with a very short bouncer to ensure Gul has to face the next over
Watson to Umar Gul, no run pushed down the leg side
Watson to Umar Gul, no run beaten outside off as he pushes forward without any footwork
Watson to Umar Gul, no run that's a beauty, in fact too good for the No. 9 as it moves late to beat Gul's outside edge

Watson to Umar Gul, no run ooh, another inswinger from Watson and gets Gul in a tangle as he tries to defend them the ball almost rolls back into the stumps. Needs some nifty footwork from Gul and in the process he nearly kicks the stumps as well
Watson to Umar Gul, no run defended into the covers
Watson to Umar Gul, FOUR runs edged! Wide of second slip and could have been swallowed by third as Gul drives away from his body
Bollinger to Salman Butt, FOUR runs meanwhile Butt plays another perfect cover drive, overpitched from Bollinger on off stump and the left hander leans on it through mid-off
Bollinger to Salman Butt, 1 run comes half forward and gets a thick inside edge into the leg side
Bollinger to Umar Gul, no run good line outside off going across Gul who shoulders arms
Bollinger to Umar Gul, no run squared up on middle stump, gets an outside edge along the ground to cover
Bollinger to Umar Gul, no run nearly plays on again! Gets an inside edge as he defends high and the ball dribbles between his legs but misses leg stump
Bollinger to Umar Gul, 1 run full on off stump, pushed in the air wide of cover but Australia won't mind that he keeps the strike
Watson to Umar Gul, no run pushed down the leg side
Watson to Umar Gul, no run back outside off stump, hint of movement away and defended to point
Watson to Umar Gul, no run touch fuller this time on off stump, defended towards mid-off
Watson to Umar Gul, no run goes to leave this but gets the bottom of the bat into the ground which sends the ball towards gully
Watson to Umar Gul, 1 run sends down the in-dipper but Gul is equal to it and works a single down to long leg
Watson to Salman Butt, no run full on off stump, defended to the off side
Bollinger to Umar Gul, no run bouncer over off stump and Gul ducks down below it
Bollinger to Umar Gul, no run stands tall and defends into the off side
Bollinger to Umar Gul, no run back of a length, pushed out towards point
Bollinger to Danish Kaneria, no run stays round the wicket, full outside off and squeezed square on the off side...there's almost a mix-up as he wants a single
Bollinger to Danish Kaneria, no run hops into line and defends to the on side
Watson to Salman Butt, no run on off stump, hint of shape back into the left hander, and defended towards mid-off who is quite deep
Watson to Salman Butt, 1 run pushed square through the off side, Butt thought he might get two but has to settle for a single as he hit it too well so Kaneria is exposed
Watson to Danish Kaneria, 3 runs finds the outside edge, squared up but it goes along the ground between third slip and gully
Watson to Salman Butt, no run outside off and left alone
Watson to Salman Butt, no run more swing takes the inside edge as Butt drives
Bollinger to Danish Kaneria, no run driven firmly to mid-off
Bollinger to Danish Kaneria, FOUR runs backs away and has a huge heave at this which flies over the slips and down to third man
Bollinger to Danish Kaneria, no run another short ball and Kaneria was backing away almost before he let it go...doesn't make contact with his attempted slash
Bollinger to Danish Kaneria, no run feels for this outside off and is beat...ball doesn't carry to Paine
Bollinger to Danish Kaneria, no run defended square on the off side
Bollinger to Danish Kaneria, 3 runs flicked past short leg and they managed to make it into three despite these two not being great runners
Watson to Danish Kaneria, no run on leg stump, defended down to mid-on
Watson to Danish Kaneria, no run on middle and blocked very correctly towards mid-off
Watson to Danish Kaneria, 1 run flicked away through square leg
Watson to Mohammad Asif, no run nearly gets through with an inswinger to Asif, but he jabs down on it in time and edges it wide of the stumps
Watson to Mohammad Asif, no run ooh, play and miss. Was there a sound? Nope, no contact
Watson to Mohammad Asif, no run way wide of the off stump and left alone...almost wide enough to be called
Johnson to Danish Kaneria, no run full outside off, Kaneria feels for it without any footwork
Johnson to Danish Kaneria, 2 runs worked neatly off middle stump out towards deep square...long leg runs around to do the fielding
Johnson to Danish Kaneria, 1 run banged in short, he goes for a huge heave over the leg side but gets a top edge down to third man...there is a fielder there, but it falls short of him
Johnson to Mohammad Asif, FOUR runs starts to back away outside leg but manages to make contact and guide it through the packed slip cordon down to third man...he exposed all three stumps
Johnson to Mohammad Asif, no run excellent yorker and well dug out
Johnson to Mohammad Asif, no run back of a length and fended into the off side...that completes the over broken by the rain
Watson to Danish Kaneria, no run outside off, swinging away and Kaneria pulls his bat inside the line
Watson to Danish Kaneria, no run full on middle stump and defended down to mid-off
Watson to Danish Kaneria, no run touch too wide outside off and Kaneria doesn't need to play
Watson to Danish Kaneria, no run another one shapes away outside off and Kaneria nearly nibbles at it

So Australia earn themselves a sizeable lead of 105 and Pakistan couldn't even bat the length of a one-day innings. Pretty disappointing effort from them, apart from Salman Butt, although the top order is quite inexperienced. Watson was good, he found some swing both ways, but the tone was set b
Innings Start
Hilfenhaus is changing is line by coming around the wicket so we just wait for the sightscreen to be moved
